channel.title: [317] Insidiax source rollbacks?
channel.description: SO when i log out, it rolls me back to a spot that i was never in, and sometimes i lose the items i had. It tells me it saved my character file, but when i log back in, not in the same spots. Help if you can will rep++

item.title: [317] Insidiax source rollbacks?
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Pretty fluent with InsidiaX and i’ve never had this problem except when you close the source without doing ::update or something like that… if you want you could go into config.java and see when it saves auto, but this source is extremely bad about rollbacks so just make sure you click save game before you log

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Insidiax source rollbacks?
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“strpkz, post:3, topic:450773”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=553654.msg4056177#msg4056177 date=1342986691]
You can’t rep, just saying.
Make sure in the logout() method, its calling the save method. Not sure on the name, but figure it out.
[/quote]
Actually, i can. I see the rep++ and the rep-- buttons. just saying.

But ill find it.[/quote]

no, u can’t, It Say’s you need atleast 15 repp to change someones karma. or sumthing.

Read full topic
